item.description:
Professional Singles Nite with SinglesCT.com Singles

Are you a Professional Single? Do you want to meet other Professional Singles?

Don’t settle for less – meet that high quality educated professional and find your perfect match!

Put on your good tie or dress and join SinglesCT.com and Local Single Professions for Magic Table

The Magic Table Lets You MEET and TALK With ALL The Other Singles At This Event, And Then The Magic Begins….

WHAT IS A PROFESSIONAL? A professional is someone with class and style,
and who takes pride in their work and personal appearance. If this describes you,
join us for Professional Singles Nite

Feel the spark and chemistry of finally meeting and connecting with someone who is a great match with you – who shares common interests and backgrounds.

Unlike Speed Dating, there is no pressure, no stress, and no boredom. We show you to your table, introduce you to other singles, start the conversation – and then you take it from there!

Professional dress is required - No jeans, t-shirts, or sneakers -DRESS TO IMPRESS

Professional Singles Night with Magic Table is a great alternative to Internet dating, speed dating, singles dances, or hanging out at the bar hoping to meet the right person. With the SinglesCT.com Magic Table, you are guaranteed to have a great time while you meet new people.

Space Is Limited -So Reserve Your Spot Today!

NEXT EVENT: Wednesday March 4 at 7 pm:

The Shadow Room
170 Main Street
Middletown, CT 06457

For Directions, Visit http://maps.google.co...

Enjoy Appetizers and the Magic Table
For $15 Online, $ 20 At The Event

RECESSION BUSTER – Only $10 Online or $15 At The Event

Reserve your spot today!

Visit http://www.SinglesCT.... or call (860) 236-3343
item.how_to_find_us: Park on Main Street on in Metro Square - look for the SinglesCT.com PARTY TONIGHT Signs

group.name: Entertainment CT .com VIP Club Music Theatre Golf Friends

item.name: Professional Singles Nite at the Upscale Shadow Room on Main Street, Middletown
